p: As a hyperproliferative disorder, cancer has continued to be a major public health challenge and is still the leading cause of morbidity and mortality all over the world [ 1]. The current therapeutic strategies have remained to be systemic chemotherapy and radiotherapy after surgeries in the last few years. However, the prognosis still remains poor because of drug resistance and severe side effects [ 2]. It is of great necessity to discover new safe and effective anti-cancer agents.
